title: Sepp Kuss to join Jonas Vingegaard for Tour de France title defense, Primož Roglič reboots
content:
Roglič penciled in for Vuelta to put Jumbo-Visma in frame for possible grand tour sweep, sponsor confirms imminent withdrawal of funding.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss to join Jonas Vingegaard for Tour de France title defense, Primož Roglič reboots on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
